name: Ensemble optimization
description:
Script for ensemble optimization using SMACdown. You can use it for classification and regression ensembles. You can select the meric to optimize (see below).

Classification metrics:

- average_recall

- average_phi

- accuracy

- average_precision

- average\_f\_measure

Regression metrics:

- r_squared

- mean\_absolute\_error

- mean\_squared\_error

inputs.name: dataset-id
inputs.description: Dataset for which we are seeking an optimal ensemble

inputs.name: objective-id
inputs.description: The ensemble's objective field, or 'default' to use the dataset's default

inputs.name: metric
inputs.description: Metric to optimize: average_recall, average_phi, accuracy, average_precision, average_f_measure, r_squared, mean_absolute_error, mean_squared_error.

inputs.name: delete-resources
inputs.description: Whether to delete all intermediate resources
